chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
On the martyrs

Through their own blood, they earned heavenly rewards, which God has given them.

They remind us to endure hardships with ease and to bear reproaches for Christ, preparing us for the holy kingdoms.
chunks.original_latin:
De martyribus. Sanguine qui proprio coelestia praemia adepti
Quae sibi retribuit retribuente Deo. Nos tolerando monent facile pretiosa subire,
Pro Christo opprobria, quae sacra regna parent.
